Nick's Blog

More CPAN

09 September 2006

The past few days have been very productive. I've released 3 modules, two of which are new. Apache2-Mogile-Dispatch 0.2.1 has been released and is packed full of major changes in architecture and functionality.

WWW::RobotRules::Memcache is a new module that allows you to use memcached to store robot rule information. Apache::No404::Mogile, an extension of Tastuhiko Miyagawa's Apache::No404Proxyis another new addition that lets you fallback to mogileFS when a file can't be found on a web server by regular means.

In the skunkworks is Apache2::SiteMap which lets you dynamically create a Google SiteMap in the same fashion as mod_dir.
